title: Reckoning Tribunal
outcome: The Council holds a public 'Truth Tribunal,' inviting citizens to testify about BCI abuses. Old injustices and new animosities surface, revealing deep system flaws and old secrets. The process is sabotaged before any real closure is reached, leaving society divided and on edge.

events.description: The Council announces a citywide Truth Tribunal, inviting all citizens to testify publicly about harms caused by the BCI system.
Dramatic testimonies reveal personal impacts of BCI misuse and hidden records showing systemic discrimination since the original data integrations under Halden.
The Directorate sabotages key session archives and attempts to disrupt proceedings, fearing further exposure of secret override protocols.
A blackout strikes mid-tribunal, erasing records and forcing an abrupt suspension. Protesters and Council members clash over blame and next steps.
